snippet.title: Front-end dev reacts to amazing CSS-only Codepens
snippet.description:
People say I'm the king, but like... yeah this stuff is insane üòÖ. Make sure you check out the codepens below so you can see them all in more detail, all so amazing!

If you'd like to learn how 3D stuff is done with CSS, Amit Sheen showed me the ropes in building a 3D, rotating cube with a bouncing ball on top of it: https://youtu.be/NdftnCDwKaU

üîó Links 
‚úÖ 3D effect on hover by Vincent Durand - https://codepen.io/onediv/pen/BprVzp
‚úÖ Free Radicals by Noah Blon - https://codepen.io/noahblon/pen/wEfCz
‚úÖ Animated cube slider by Alberto Hartzet - https://codepen.io/hrtzt/pen/JdYaEZ
‚úÖ Pure CSS Playing Card by Ben Evans - https://codepen.io/ivorjetski/pen/ExaKmjw
‚úÖ 3D step counter card by Steve Gardner - https://codepen.io/ste-vg/pen/wdBRZN
‚úÖ Pure CSS Still Life by Ben Evans - https://codepen.io/ivorjetski/pen/xMJoYO
‚úÖ Mona Lisa with pure CSS by Jay Salvat - https://codepen.io/jaysalvat/pen/HaqBf
‚úÖ 3D CSS Typography by Noah Blon - https://codepen.io/noahblon/pen/CsxfH
‚úÖ Newton's Cradle by Amit Sheen: https://codepen.io/amit_sheen/pen/XWMXwvJ
‚úÖ Polypane Browser: https://polypane.app/
#css

--

Come hang out with other dev's in my Discord Community
üí¨ https://discord.gg/nTYCvrK
